subject: Cannot log into my account
description: I have been trying to log in for the past hour but keep getting an invalid credentials error even though my password is correct.

subject: Billing charge I don't recognize
description: There is a $49.99 charge on my last statement that I did not authorize. Please investigate.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after the splash screen every time I try to open it on my iPhone 15.

subject: Request for dark mode
description: It would be great if you could add a dark mode option to the dashboard. The bright white background is hard on the eyes at night.

subject: Two-factor authentication not sending codes
description: I am not receiving SMS verification codes when trying to log in. I have confirmed my phone number is correct.

subject: Upgrade plan not reflected
description: I upgraded to the Pro plan yesterday but my account still shows the Basic plan features.

subject: Search function returns no results
description: The search bar on the inventory page returns zero results for any query even though I have hundreds of items.

subject: Export to CSV is broken
description: When I click export on the reports page the downloaded CSV file is empty with only headers and no data rows.

subject: Question about annual pricing
description: Can you clarify whether the annual plan includes priority support or if that is an additional cost?

subject: Need API rate limit increase
description: Our integration is hitting the 1000 requests per minute limit during peak hours. We need this increased to at least 5000.

subject: Password reset link expired
description: The password reset email I received has an expired link even though I just requested it two minutes ago.

subject: Dashboard loading very slowly
description: The main dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load and sometimes times out completely. This started happening yesterday.

subject: Cannot delete old project
description: I am trying to delete an archived project from 2023 but the delete button is grayed out and unresponsive.

subject: Mobile layout broken on tablet
description: The navigation menu overlaps with the main content area when using the app on my iPad in landscape mode.

subject: Webhook notifications stopped
description: Our webhook endpoint stopped receiving event notifications about three days ago with no changes on our side.

subject: Request to cancel subscription
description: I would like to cancel my subscription effective at the end of the current billing cycle. Please confirm.

subject: File upload fails over 10MB
description: Any file larger than 10MB fails to upload with a generic error message. The documentation says the limit should be 50MB.

subject: Account locked after failed attempts
description: My account got locked after three failed login attempts and the unlock email never arrived.

subject: Integrate with Slack
description: Please consider adding a native Slack integration so we can receive alerts directly in our team channels.

subject: Incorrect timezone on reports
description: All timestamps in my exported reports show UTC instead of my configured timezone which is EST.

subject: Refund for double charge
description: I was charged twice for my March subscription payment. Please issue a refund for the duplicate charge of $29.99.

subject: SSO configuration help needed
description: We are trying to set up SAML-based single sign-on with Okta but keep getting a certificate validation error.

subject: Notification preferences not saving
description: Every time I update my email notification preferences and click save the changes revert back to defaults.

subject: Feature: bulk user import
description: We need the ability to import users in bulk via CSV upload rather than adding them one at a time.

subject: Cannot access shared workspace
description: My colleague shared a workspace with me but I get a 403 forbidden error when trying to open it.

subject: Calendar sync not working
description: The Google Calendar integration stopped syncing events about a week ago. Disconnecting and reconnecting did not help.

subject: Print layout cuts off content
description: When printing invoices from the billing page the right side of the table gets cut off on standard letter paper.

subject: Inquiry about student discount
description: I am a university student and wanted to know if you offer any educational or student pricing discounts.

subject: API documentation outdated
description: The API docs for the v3 endpoints still reference v2 parameter names which causes confusion and errors.

subject: Add keyboard shortcuts
description: It would be really helpful to have keyboard shortcuts for common actions like saving and navigating between tabs.

subject: Images not loading in editor
description: All images in the rich text editor show as broken icons. This happens across all my documents.

subject: Changed email but cannot verify
description: I updated my account email address but the verification email was sent to my old address which I no longer have access to.

subject: Custom report builder request
description: We would love a drag-and-drop report builder where we can pick which metrics and date ranges to include.

subject: Error 500 on checkout page
description: I get a server error every time I try to complete the checkout process for the team plan upgrade.

subject: Audit log not recording events
description: The admin audit log has not captured any events since last Monday even though team members have been active.

subject: Downgrade plan options unclear
description: The pricing page does not clearly explain what features I would lose if I downgrade from Pro to Basic.

subject: Mobile push notifications delayed
description: Push notifications on Android are arriving 15 to 20 minutes late which makes time-sensitive alerts useless.

subject: Cannot connect third-party storage
description: Attempting to link my Dropbox account for file storage gives a token expired error even with a fresh authorization.

subject: Duplicate contacts in address book
description: The contact list is showing duplicate entries for many contacts after the last sync. Merging does not resolve it.

subject: Support for multiple languages
description: It would be beneficial to have the interface available in Spanish and French in addition to English.

subject: Session expires too quickly
description: My session keeps expiring after only about 5 minutes of inactivity which is very disruptive when multitasking.

subject: Invoice PDF formatting issue
description: Downloaded invoice PDFs have overlapping text in the line items section making them unreadable.

subject: How to enable SSO for team
description: Can someone walk me through the steps to enable single sign-on for our organization account?

subject: Drag and drop not working
description: The drag and drop functionality for reordering tasks stopped working after the latest Chrome update.

subject: Charge after cancellation
description: I cancelled my subscription two weeks ago but was still charged on the 1st of this month. Please refund.

subject: Video calls dropping frequently
description: Video calls in the built-in conferencing tool drop after about 10 minutes consistently on both WiFi and cellular.

subject: REST API pagination broken
description: The cursor-based pagination on the /users endpoint returns the same page of results regardless of the cursor value.

subject: Need help transferring ownership
description: I am leaving the company and need to transfer project ownership to my colleague but cannot find the option.

subject: Add two-factor app support
description: Please add support for authenticator apps like Google Authenticator as an alternative to SMS-based two-factor authentication.

subject: General inquiry about product
description: I saw your product mentioned in a blog post and wanted to learn more about what plans are available for small teams.
